long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlockBird is an innovative Chrome extension designed to enhance your blockchain experience with a suite of powerful tools. Key features include:

- Blockchain Explorers: Easily access and explore different blockchains with direct links to their respective block explorers.
- Airdrop Scanner: Scan the current webpage for keywords such as "airdrop," "points," and "rewards," providing valuable insights into potential opportunities and relevant information.
- Wallet Manager: Store and manage your cryptocurrency wallet addresses for quick and easy access.
- Solana Tokens: Tokens tab shows a list of the 10 most recent Jupiter verified Solana tokens. LST tab shows all LSTs listed by Sanctum.

Whether you're a developer, investor, or airdrop farmer, BlockBird simplifies your blockchain activities, making it an indispensable tool for anyone involved in the blockchain ecosystem.

Languages: Filipino, Hindi, Hausa, Indonesian, Mandarin, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Thai, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese

Visit https://natechisley.com/chrome-brave-extensions to view our changelog.
